name: Chrono Express
description:
Chrono Express is a hardcore Platformer that looks like an Endless-Running game.

It makes player could experience the fun game play of classic Platformers like Super Mario using a simplified game mechanics borrowed from Endless-Running genre.

In this game, you play a courier of "Chrono Express" whose daily job is to drive through dangerous hyperspace tunnel and deliver package to the customer safely.

------

*** FEATURES ***
- Richer game play than common endless running games
- 2 game modes: Package Deliver + Endless Running
- 9 types of levels: spiky walls, giant gears, missiles…
- Procedural levels generation make each run unique and fun
- Use gadgets to upgrade your bike and gain special abilities
- Customize characters with steampunk accessories
